turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey there, I was looking to order some coffee from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, let's do it. which starbucks should i order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one in Fort Gratiot, Michigan.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I was thinking about getting a black and white mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want the drink iced or hot?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and what type of milk do you want?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the order of 1 grande iced black and white mocha with whole milk from the starbucks in fort gratiot comes out to $4.50

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want me to place the order now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. i've submitted the order, it'll b ready in 15 mins
